abilities.name: Spirit Swoop
abilities.description: Deal 141 damage to enemies in a line, slowing them by 30% for 2 seconds.

abilities.name: Misha, Charge!
abilities.description: Misha charges in a line, dealing 59 damage and stunning enemies for 1.25 seconds.

abilities.name: Mend Pet
abilities.description: Heal Misha for 714 Health over 5 seconds.

heroics.name: Unleash the Boars
heroics.description: Release a herd of boars that track down all enemy Heroes in a direction, dealing 110 damage, revealing, and slowing enemies by 40% for 5 seconds.

heroics.name: Bestial Wrath
heroics.description: Increases Misha's Basic Attack damage by 150% for 12 seconds.

original.name: Rexxar
original.title: Champion of the Horde
original.description: It was a strange twist of fate that led the wandering half-ogre Rexxar to the fledgling city of Orgrimmar. With his aid, Thrall and the Horde were able to secure their homeland and defend it from the invading forces of Lord Admiral Daelin Proudmoore.
original.shortDescription: A Bruiser that with his bear, Misha, expertly controls areas of the battleground.

baseHeroInfo.name: Rexxar
baseHeroInfo.title: Champion of the Horde
baseHeroInfo.description: It was a strange twist of fate that led the wandering half-ogre Rexxar to the fledgling city of Orgrimmar. With his aid, Thrall and the Horde were able to secure their homeland and defend it from the invading forces of Lord Admiral Daelin Proudmoore.
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A Bruiser that with his bear, Misha, expertly controls areas of the battleground.

trait.name: Misha, Focus!
trait.description: Passive: Misha gains 15% move speed. Command Misha to attack a specific enemy or move to a point and wait. Targeting Rexxar commands Misha to retreat to his position, gaining 30% move speed until she reaches Rexxar. Targeting Misha commands her to hold her current position.

skins.name: Champion of the Horde
skins.description: It was a strange twist of fate that led the wandering half-ogre Rexxar to the fledgling city of Orgrimmar. With his aid, Thrall and the Horde were able to secure their homeland and defend it from the invading forces of Lord Admiral Daelin Proudmoore.

skins.name: Beastmaster Rexxar
skins.description: A beastmaster is at one with the wilds. When they kill, they ensure every part of the animal is made use of.

skins.name: Raider Rexxar
skins.description: The terrans are descended from Earth's exiled prisoners, mutants, and degenerates. Some, like the military ursine-handler Cpl. Rex Arkk, are more genetically aberrant than others.

skins.name: Frostlord Rexxar
skins.description: When the Crystal Citadel fell, the Frostlords were scattered and never heard from again. Legend holds that some still wander the frozen tundras of the north, ever searching for a new home.
